means: 发出连续而无意义的声音
闲扯，东拉西扯，（小孩般）咿咿呀呀的话

sentence.Network_en: What a bore it was to listen to the woman's prattle!
sentence.Network_cn: 听那个女人唠叨真烦人！
艾美兴高采烈地叽叽喳喳说个不停,汤姆感到无法忍受.

sentence.Network_en: Flowing water and green grass witness your lover's endless prattle.
sentence.Network_cn: 流水缠绕,小草依依,都是你诉不尽的情话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... mortu-ary 太平间） prattle 闲聊） sightliness n 悦目，好看（来自.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... gristle 软骨结构，软骨 prattle 闲聊，空谈 tattle 闲谈，泄密.
800 chinese flashcards | Quizlet ... prate 唠叨，啰唆 prattle 闲扯 preamble 前言.
Terry_新浪博客 ... wallow v. 打滚，沉迷 prattle v. 唠叨 savory a. 美味的.

list.abs: She went on prattling away , but I had stopped , listening ., 她继续喋喋不休地说 , 但我已不再听了.
That is why I prattle andlightly and hide my heat behind words ., 因此我轻松的说东道西 , 把我的心藏在语言的后面.
That is why I prattle andlightly and hide my heart behind words ., 因此我轻浮地说笑打趣 , 用话语掩藏我的真心.
the most romantic prattle , which has been with you when the man called up to ask : " how ? "最浪漫的情话，是当哪个已经跟你分了手的人打电话来问：“你好吗？”
The water prattled over the rocks ., 水在石上淙淙地流过.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Middle Low German pratelen, from praten (see prate)

entry.def: If you say that someone prattles on about something, you are criticizing them because they are talking a great deal without saying anything important.

example.ex: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream...
example.tran: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

example.ex: She prattled on as she drove out to the Highway...
example.tran: 她开车上公路时一直说个没完。

means.word_mean: 1. idle or foolish and irrelevant talk
1. speak (about unimportant matters) rapidly and incessantly

auth_sentence.content: Those who prattle on about 'Victorian Values'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those who prattle on about 'Victorian Values'.

auth_sentence.content: Hence the wishy washy, namby pamby prattle about narrow mindedness etc.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence the wishy washy, namby pamby prattle about narrow mindedness etc.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence the wishy washy, namby pamby prattle about narrow mindedness etc.

auth_sentence.content: But you have to actually USE the scientific method, not just prattle on endlessly about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But you have to actually USE the scientific method, not just prattle on endlessly about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But you have to actually USE the scientific method, not just prattle on endlessly about it.

means.word_mean: (小孩般)天真无邪地说话,发出连续而无意义的声音；闲扯,东拉西扯

sentences.en: The water prattled over the rocks.
She prattled the secret to the stranger.
sentences.cn: 她竟轻率地把秘密告诉了陌生人。
